sanskrit: अद्वेष्टा सर्वभूतानां मैत्रः करुण एव च। निर्ममो निरहङ्कारः समदुःखसुखः क्षमी॥
transliteration: adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānāṃ maitraḥ karuṇa eva ca | nirmamo nirahaṅkāraḥ sama-duḥkha-sukhaḥ kṣamī ||
english: One who is free from hatred toward all beings, who is friendly and compassionate, free from possessiveness and ego, equal in pleasure and pain, and forgiving.
hindi: जो सभी प्राणियों से द्वेष रहित, मैत्रीपूर्ण और करुणामय है, ममता और अहंकार से रहित, सुख-दुःख में समान और क्षमाशील है।
principle: Compassion and equanimity lead to emotional well-being.

sanskrit: सन्तुष्टः सततं योगी यतात्मा दृढनिश्चयः। मय्यर्पितमनोबुद्धिर्यो मद्भक्तः स मे प्रियः॥
transliteration: santuṣṭaḥ satataṃ yogī yatātmā dṛḍha-niścayaḥ | mayy arpita-mano-buddhir yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ ||
english: Always content, steady in meditation, self-controlled, and with firm determination, with mind and intellect dedicated - such a devotee is dear to Me.
hindi: सदा संतुष्ट, योग में स्थित, आत्मसंयमी, दृढ़निश्चयी, मुझमें अर्पित मन-बुद्धि वाला भक्त मुझे प्रिय है।
principle: Contentment and steady practice lead to inner peace.
